page.title: 13MEMORIES OF A SENIOR CITIZEN
page.content: Senior Citizen Mrs.Gwen Lewis of Monkton Farleigh is a{T.V.star!}She was filmed in a documentary about{two {generations:}herself and her grand- daughter,Sally,who was{married}at the village church last year but then {moved away. Mrs.Lewis has lived in three different houses in Monkton Farleigh,and remembers the time when there were {only two cars}in the village.The milkman would bring your milk on a {horse and cart}and pour it into a jug. When the{War}started she joined the NAAFI and worked in the kitchen.She recalls that the{church bells}weren't rung in the war-they were kept as a {warning}in case of enemy attack. Today,Mrs.Lewis enjoys{the company of {her friends}at Luncheon Club and Bingo.She says she would never leave the village.
